text: This is a list of colleges and universities who play water polo in the Collegiate Water Polo Association: *Brown University *Bucknell University *Connecticut College *Fordham University *Gannon University *George Washington University *Grove City College *Hartwick College *Harvard University *Indiana University *Iona College *Johns Hopkins University *Massachusetts Institute of Technology *Mercyhurst College *Pennsylvania State University *Princeton University *Queens College of the City of New York *Saint Francis College *Slippery Rock University *United States Naval Academy *University of Maryland *University of Michigan *Utica College *Washington and Jefferson College ==References== *
title: Collegiate Water Polo Association
